# Diagnostics Docs

## .NET CLI global tools

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/tools-overview.md): An overview of the tools available to diagnose .NET Core applications.
- [dotnet-counters](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/dotnet-counters.md): Learn how to install and use the dotnet-counter CLI tool for ad-hoc health monitoring and first-level performance investigation.
- [dotnet-dump](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/dotnet-dump.md): Learn how to install and use the dotnet-dump CLI tool to collect and analyze Windows and Linux dumps without any native debugger.
- [dotnet-gcdump](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/dotnet-gcdump.md): Learn how to install and use dotnet-gcdump CLI tool to collect GC (Garbage Collector) dumps of live .NET processes using the .NET EventPipe.
- [dotnet-monitor](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/dotnet-monitor.md): Learn how to install and use the dotnet-monitor tool to collect dumps, traces, logs, and metrics from applications in production environments.
- [dotnet-trace](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/dotnet-trace.md): Learn how to install and use the dotnet-trace CLI tool to collect .NET traces of a running process without the native profiler, by using the .NET EventPipe.
- [dotnet-stack](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/dotnet-stack.md): Learn how to install and use the dotnet-stack CLI tool which captures and prints the managed stacks for all threads in the target .NET process.
- [dotnet-symbol](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/dotnet-symbol.md): Learn how to install and use the dotnet-symbol CLI tool to download files required for debugging .NET dumps and minidumps.
- [dotnet-debugger-extensions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/dotnet-debugger-extensions.md): Learn how to install and use the dotnet-debugger-extensions CLI tool to manage the .NET debugging extensions, which is used with native debuggers on Windows and Linux.
- [dotnet-sos](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/dotnet-sos.md): Learn how to install and use the dotnet-sos CLI tool to manage the SOS debugger extension, which is used with native debuggers on Windows and Linux.
- [dotnet-dsrouter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/dotnet-dsrouter.md): An introduction to dotnet-dsrouter in .NET.

## .NET diagnostics tutorials

- [Collect performance trace in Linux with PerfCollect](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/trace-perfcollect-lttng.md): A tutorial that walks you through collecting a trace with perfcollect in .NET.
- [Debug a memory leak](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/debug-memory-leak.md): Learn how to debug a memory leak in .NET.
- [Debug high CPU usage](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/debug-highcpu.md): A tutorial that walks you through debugging high CPU usage in .NET Core.
- [Debug deadlock](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/debug-deadlock.md): A tutorial that walks you through debugging a locking issue in .NET Core.
- [Debug ThreadPool starvation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/debug-threadpool-starvation.md): A tutorial that walks you through debugging and fixing a ThreadPool starvation issue on .NET Core
- [Debug a stack overflow](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/debug-stackoverflow.md): Learn how to diagnose StackOverflow exceptions

## Built-in metrics

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/built-in-metrics.md): Review the metrics built-in for the .NET runtime and libraries.
- [.NET runtime metrics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/built-in-metrics-runtime.md): Review the metrics available for .NET runtime libraries.
- [.NET extensions metrics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/built-in-metrics-diagnostics.md): Review the metrics available for diagnostic .NET extensions libraries.
- [System.Net metrics](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/built-in-metrics-system-net.md): Review the metrics available for System.Net

## Diagnostic port

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/diagnostic-port.md): Learn about .NET diagnostic ports

## Diagnostics and instrumentation

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/index.md): An overview of the tools and techniques available to diagnose .NET Core applications.
- [Managed debuggers](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/managed-debuggers.md): An overview of the Visual Studio and Visual Studio Code managed debuggers.
- [Profiling tools](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/profilers.md): An overview of .NET profiling tools.
- [Logging & tracing options](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/logging-tracing.md): An introduction to .NET logging and tracing.
- [App health checks](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/diagnostic-health-checks.md): Learn how to use resource utilization and application lifetime health checks in .NET app development.

## DiagnosticSource and DiagnosticListener

- [Get started](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/diagnostics/diagnosticsource-diagnosticlistener.md): An overview of DiagnosticSource/DiagnosticListener including guidance on logging events, instrumenting code, and consuming data.
